This Date field from the billing system captures the specific calendar date a subscriber completed a recharge or top-up transaction. | Use the last Recharge Date to trigger timely reminder campaigns for prepaid subscribers, encouraging them to top-up before their balance expires. | Analyze the frequency of Recharge Date entries for customer segmentation, identifying high-value users and predicting potential churn based on inactivity. | Synonyms for this Date field include 'last top-up date' or 'account recharge date,' used to query the CRM for recent transactions. | When was the subscriber's last Recharge Date for their current plan? USER_DESCRIPTION: A numeric value from the billing system representing the highest single-week voice revenue generated by a subscriber over the last 4 weeks. | This numeric metric identifies high-value customers by their max voice revenue, crucial for retention campaigns and personalized upselling offers in the CRM. | Used for subscriber base segmentation, this numeric field tracks max voice revenue over 4 weeks to predict future spending and offer engagement. | Show me the peak voice revenue in the last 4 weeks; highest voice ARPU in the recent billing cycle; maximum numeric voice spend. | What was the subscriber's max numeric voice revenue in the last month to assess their plan's value?

A string value from the billing system indicating the customer's revenue trend, such as 'Increasing', 'Decreasing', or 'Stable'. | Identifies changes in customer revenue to manage ARPU, allowing proactive retention campaigns for subscribers with a 'Decreasing' trend (string). | Used in churn prediction models to segment subscribers based on their revenue trend (string), identifying high-value customers at risk. | Show me the subscriber spending pattern, customer revenue direction, or ARPU trend from the CRM as a string value. | What is this subscriber's customer revenue trend (string)? A string value in the CRM system that classifies a customer into a specific RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) category. | This string-based Customer RFM Category is used in marketing campaigns to target high-value subscribers with exclusive offers and retention strategies. | For analytical segmentation, this string-based Customer RFM Category helps predict churn risk and identify subscribers with high lifetime value (LTV). | Show me the subscriber's value segment, customer RFM classification, or the string representing their purchasing behavior category from the billing system. | What is the subscriber's Customer RFM Category string value in their profile for the loyalty program?

A numeric field from the billing system indicating a subscriber's total data usage (M2) in gigabytes over a two-month period. | This numeric KPI helps identify subscribers with high M2 data usage for upselling to higher-tier data plans and managing network capacity. | Used for customer segmentation based on total data consumption patterns (M2) to predict churn risk and analyze impact on ARPU, as a numeric metric. | Subscriber's two-month data consumption, M2 data volume, total data usage over 60 days; all are numeric values from the CRM. | What was the subscriber's total data usage in GB over the last two months (M2)?
